data.title: Automated Literature Review Using Large Language Models: A Systematic Approach
data.abstract: We present a novel framework for automated literature review that leverages large language models to search, filter, and synthesize academic papers. Our approach includes multi-tier quality control and cost-aware model selection.

data.title: Cost-Aware LLM Selection for Research Automation: Balancing Quality and Budget
data.abstract: This study examines trade-offs between different large language model providers for automated research tasks, with focus on cost optimization while maintaining output quality.

data.title: Hallucination Detection in AI-Generated Scientific Summaries
data.abstract: We propose methods for detecting and preventing hallucinations in AI-generated academic literature summaries, including citation validation and fact-checking techniques.
